text: Cees de Boer (1941 - 14 February 2025) was a Dutch footballer player who played as a left winger. From 1960 to 1962 he played with Alkmaar '54. He played in the Eredivisie, highest level of professional football in the Netherlands. In 1962, he suffered a ankle injury, that let to the end of his professional career. He later played with amateur football club De Zouaven. He also became manager of the club. His sons were football players Ronald de Boer and Frank de Boer. In 2020 he had a traffic accident when he hit a motorcycle with his electric bicycle. De Boer died on 14 February 2025, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:Dutch footballers Category:1941 births Category:2025 deaths Category:People from North Holland Category:Place of death missing
title: Cees de Boer
